dialog.name: find
dialog.whatsthis: Type the name of the component, net, or site that you want to find.
Select the type of search element from the drop-down menu.
Select the type of site from the drop-down menu.
Returns only those elements that are complete-word matches.
Returns only those elements that match upper and lower cases.
Searches forward to find the next match.
Searches backward to find the previous match.
Highlights all found elements on the Physical View layout.
